root.name: Invictus: In the Shadow of Olympus
root.description: Invictus: In the Shadow of Olympus is a real time battle strategy game with characters and themes drawn on Greek Mythology.Â The game was released in 2000, and was developed by Quicksilver Software and published by Interplay's strategy division 14 Degrees East. It was re-released on GOG.com for $5.99.
